meta.max_stay: 30 Days (Multiple Entry valid for 2 years often granted)

add.title: Form 14A
add.description: Duly filled and signed Form 14A (Singapore Visa Application Form).

add.title: Cover Letter
add.description: Letter explaining travel dates, purpose, and employment details.

modify.description: Recent color photo (taken within last 3 months). White background. No borders. 400x514 pixels.

steps_flow.title: Find Authorized Agent
steps_flow.description: Singapore High Commission does not accept individual applications. Apply via an authorized visa agent (e.g., VFS, Thomas Cook, or local agents).

steps_flow.title: Submit Documents
steps_flow.description: Submit physical form 14A and photos to the agent.

steps_flow.title: Agent Applies Online
steps_flow.description: Agent submits application via SAVE (Submission of Application for Visa Electronically).

steps_flow.title: Receive E-Visa
steps_flow.description: Receive the E-Visa PDF from your agent.
